Monday, January 31, 2022

5:30 PM

Arrived

5:45 PM

Jan 31, 2022

I. CITY MANAGER'S AGENDA
1. A communication transmitted from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report
Item Number 21-93, regarding proposed amendments to the Municipal Code relative to recent charter
changes. (Ordinance #2022-2) CHARTER RIGHT EXERCISED BY COUNCILLOR NOLAN IN
COUNCIL JANUARY 31, 2022
CMA 2022 #10
RESULT:
CHARTER RIGHT EXECISED BY COUNCILLOR NOLAN
Next: 2/7/2022 5:30 PM

2. A communication transmitted from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report
Item Number 21-77, regarding a report on ways to report pedestrian and cycling crashes using realtime reporting.
CMA 2022 #11
RESULT:
REFERRED TO THE CITY MANAGER BY VICE MAYOR MALLON [8-0-1-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Azeem, Councillor Zondervan

PRESENT:
Councillor Simmons

3. A communication transmitted from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report
Item Number 22-5, regarding pedestrian safety on Broadway at CRLS.
CMA 2022 #12
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

4. A communication transmitted from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report
Item Number 21-85, which requesting a report on potential modifications or adjustments to the recent
improvements that were made on the segment of Massachusetts Avenue from Dudley Street to
Alewife Brook Parkway.
CMA 2022 #13
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 2

Jan 31, 2022

Councillor Zondervan

YEAS:

Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

REFERRED TO THE PETITION [9-0-0]

Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

REFERRED TO THE PETITION [9-0-0]

YEAS:

Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 3

Jan 31, 2022

II. CALENDAR

CHARTER RIGHT
1. An application was received from Kevin O'Donnel, requesting permission for a curb cut at the
premises numbered 59 Fresh Pond Lane; said petition has received approval from Inspectional
Services, Traffic, Parking and Transportation, Historical Commission and Public Works. No
response has been received from the neighborhood association.
APP 2022 #1
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

2. That the City Manager be and hereby is requested to confer with all appropriate departments, as
well as, the Cambridge Water Board and Fresh Pond Advisory Committee and present a report
to the Neighborhood & Long Term Planning, Public Facilities, Arts and Celebration Committee,
which includes but is not limited to a legal analysis of what uses are currently permitted,
information on the history of the golf course, residency and other demographic information about
membership data of golf course users, and any environmental constraints
POR 2022 #9
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Zondervan, Councillor Azeem
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 4

Jan 31, 2022

III. APPLICATIONS AND PETITIONS
1. An application was received from Heather Dudko representing Citizens Bank, requesting permission
for a projecting sign externally illuminated by spot at the premises numbered 698 Massachusetts
Avenue approval has been received from Inspectional Services, Department of Public Works,
Community Development Department and abutter.
APP 2022 #2
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [8-1-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem

NAYS:
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 5

Jan 31, 2022

V. RESOLUTIONS
1. Congratulations to the City Manager’s Anti-Racism, Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Awardees.
Councillor Simmons and entire membership.
RES 2022 #20
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

2. Condolences to the family of State Senator Bill Owens.
Councillor Simmons and entire membership.
RES 2022 #21
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

3. Congratulations to Deval Patrick on the occasion of his new role at the Kennedy School of
Government’s Center for Public Leadership.
Councillor Simmons and entire membership.
RES 2022 #22
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

4. Resolution on the death of Doris Cyr.
Councillor Toner and entire membership.
RES 2022 #23
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 12

Jan 31, 2022

Councillor Toner and entire membership.
RES 2022 #24
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

6. Congratulations to Peter Ciurczak and Elizabeth McIntyre on the birth of their daughter, June
Ciurczak-McIntyre.
Councillor McGovern and entire membership.
RES 2022 #25
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

7. That the City Council and City of Cambridge go on record thanking Officer Albert for his long and
honorable service to the City of Cambridge.
Councillor Toner and entire membership.
RES 2022 #26
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [8-1-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem

NAYS:
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 13

Jan 31, 2022

VI. POLICY ORDER AND RESOLUTION LIST
1. That the City Council go on record recognizing February 2022 as Black History Month in the City of
Cambridge.
POR 2022 #13
Councillor Simmons, Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

2. Wage Theft Ordinance (Ordinance #2022-3).
POR 2022 #14
Councillor Zondervan, Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Toner
RESULT:
REFERRED TO THE ORDINANCE COMMITTEE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan

3. That the City Council and School Committee hold a joint virtual roundtable on Tuesday, February 8,
2022 to discuss priorities for the FY23. Budget.
POR 2022 #15
Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Toner, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Vice Mayor Mallon,
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Azeem,
Councillor Zondervan


PAGE 14

Jan 31, 2022
